sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
provided with lodging
, mu za določeno obdobje priskrbijo bivališče.

seg.quote: They were offered free lodging in first-class hotels.

sense.def:
Kdor živi
in lodgings
, stanuje v delu hiše, ki je last nekoga drugega, in mu za to plačuje.

seg.quote: They have to find lodgings in the village.
